originTraits.name: Serviles
originTraits.description: This species evolved alongside a second, more advanced species. Never particularly intelligent to begin with, selective breeding for physical prowess and docility has reduced them to servile proles.
effects: Cannot be employed in Ruler or Specialist Jobs

originTraits.name: Clone Soldier
originTraits.description: Engineered for compliance and war: short-lived, unable to reproduce naturally, and very efficient.
effects: Admirals gain the Clone Army Admiral trait
Decline without sufficent Ancient Clone Vat buildings

originTraits.name: Survivor
originTraits.description: This species has survived the horrors of a nuclear apocalypse. Their capacity for thriving in the most inhospitable circumstances should not be underestimated

originTraits.name: Void Dweller
originTraits.description: This species thrives in orbital habitats, with an instinctive ability to efficiently navigate their maze-like corridors and complicated architecture. However their weakened immune systems do not respond well to a planetary environment.

originTraits.name: Necrophage
originTraits.description: This species of near-immortals procreates by consuming pops of other species
effects: +5% Resources from Ruler and Specialist Jobs

originTraits.name: Cave Dweller
originTraits.description: This species thrives under the surface of any planet they can find, at the cost of population growth

originTraits.name: Perfected Genes
originTraits.description: Millennia of eugenics and wars have led to the creation of an extremely resilient species

originTraits.name: Cybernetic
originTraits.description: This species has embraced cybernetics on such a scale that its members may be considered cyborgs. They routinely replace their organic body parts with more advanced mechanical versions.

originTraits.name: Latent Psionic
originTraits.description: This species has latent psionic abilities, which are dormant in most of its members. Although quite rare, these powers will manifest in some leaders.
effects: Leaders have a chance to gain the Psychic trait

originTraits.name: Hive Minded
originTraits.description: This species is made up of semi-autonomous individuals slaved to a single, unfathomably vast consciousness

originTraits.name: Aquatic
originTraits.description: This species is perfectly adapted to living in the depths of the ocean. However, on dry land, it is like a fish out of water.
effects: +30% Housing usage on Dry and Frozen planets
Hydrocentric ascension boosts this trait's effects by 50%

originTraits.name: Stargazer
originTraits.description: This species has always, consciously or not, longed to traverse the void between the stars
